title: Epic: API Routes
description:
Implement FastAPI routes for auth and agent interactions.

## Routes
- /auth/meta/login - Redirect to Meta OAuth
- /auth/meta/callback - Handle OAuth callback
- /api/analyze - Trigger analysis
- /api/recommendations - Get recommendations
- /api/execute - Execute approved recommendations
- /api/accounts - List connected accounts
